dataflow_exception.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_DATAFLOW_EXCEPTION_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_DATAFLOW_EXCEPTION_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // dataflow_exception.hpp:
00011

00018 
00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #ifndef BOOST_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00021 #include <exception>
00022 #endif //BOOST_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00023 
00024 #include <cassert>
00025 
00026 namespace boost {
00027 namespace archive {
00028 namespace iterators {
00029 
00031 // exceptions thrown by dataflows
00032 //
00033 class dataflow_exception : public std::exception
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     typedef enum {
00037         invalid_6_bitcode,
00038         invalid_base64_character,
00039         invalid_xml_escape_sequence,
00040         comparison_not_permitted,
00041         invalid_conversion,
00042         other_exception
00043     } exception_code;
00044     exception_code code;
00045 
00046     dataflow_exception(exception_code c = other_exception) : code(c)
00047     {}
00048 
00049     virtual const char *what( ) const throw( )
00050     {
00051         const char *msg = "unknown exception code";
00052         switch(code){
00053         case invalid_6_bitcode:
00054             msg = "attempt to encode a value > 6 bits";
00055             break;
00056         case invalid_base64_character:
00057             msg = "attempt to decode a value not in base64 char set";
00058             break;
00059         case invalid_xml_escape_sequence:
00060             msg = "invalid xml escape_sequence";
00061             break;
00062         case comparison_not_permitted:
00063             msg = "cannot invoke iterator comparison now";
00064             break;
00065         case invalid_conversion:
00066             msg = "invalid multbyte/wide char conversion";
00067             break;
00068         default:
00069             assert(false);
00070             break;
00071         }
00072         return msg;
00073     }
00074 };
00075 
00076 } // namespace iterators
00077 } // namespace archive
00078 } // namespace boost
00079 
00080 #endif //BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_DATAFLOW_EXCEPTION_HPP
